Title: Questionable Characters
Plot: Lori helps her former informant who was shot while robbing a convenience store and who does not want the bullet removed because it could incriminate him. Things become more complex for Lori when she learns that the bullet is jeopardizing his life. Meanwhile, Alan tries to help his client who is accused of being a slumlord and is forced to do despicable acts from an infuriating judge. Denny gets arrested for solicitation.
GuestStars: Dey Young,  Willie C. Carpenter,  Bruno Campos,  Jon Bernthal,  Nike Doukas,  Nancy Stephens,  Scott Alan Smith,  Shawn Michael Patrick,  Marshall Manesh,  Hildy Brooks,  Sue Ozeran,  Laura Henry,  James Howell
